snippet.title: Little Cities | 1 Year Celebration and Sandbox Update Teaser | Meta Quest VR
snippet.description:
Prepare for endless cozy creativity with Little Cities! To celebrate a year of updates to Quest's favourite city creator, we're delivering one of our community's biggest asks! Watch this teaser, which debuted at this year's Quest Gaming Showcase, to get an exclusive glimpse of the upcoming Sandbox Update! 

There’ll be plenty more details revealed soon...
----
💙 Buy Now - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4988470131168299
----
🏗️Developed by Purple Yonder
🧰Published by nDreams
----
👍 Subscribe - @nDreamsVR  
----
💻 Learn More - http://ndreams.com/games/little-cities
----
